title: Surveillance of COVID-19 vaccines: A comprehensive analysis of the first immunization drive in Ecuador
content:
Publication date: 30 March 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 6

Author(s): Andrea Orellana-Manzano, Andrea C. Garcia-Angulo, Fernanda B. Cordeiro, Diana Carvajal-Aldaz, Elizabeth Centeno, María J. Vizcaíno, Sebastián Poveda, Merly Garcia, Carmen Matías-De la Cruz, Derly Andrade-Molina, Mariuxi Mirabá, Saurabh Mehta, Washington B. Cárdenas
